collection.name: The Heart of Aspiration
collection.openText: Excessive aspiration will result in a frenzy.

specialTipSize.specialTip: Subjects who equip $0 will enjoy an increased HP and Attack Speed.
After being ordered to return $0 without attacking anyone, the wearer loses their mind and will attack anything nearby increasing their violent tendencies.
If the subject is ordered to return $0 within 30 seconds after being equipped, it will have the same effect as above.
